name: Sure Cuts A Lot Version 5 Project
summary: Learn about .SCUT5 files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Sure Cuts A Lot is a program that enables you to import artwork or create custom designs, then cut them out for use in the real world with electronic cutting machines. As you create a design with version 5 of Sure Cuts A Lot, you can save it as a project with the .scut5 file extension to preserve your progress.

Each version of Sure Cuts A Lot saves projects with a .scut file extension followed by a number indicating the version of Sure Cuts A Lot that created it. For example, version 4 of Sure Cuts A Lot creates a project with the .scut4 file extension (.SCUT4 file).

instructions: You can open a SCUT5 with Craft Edge Sure Cuts A Lot (version 5 or later). For example, to open a SCUT5 file with version 5 of Sure Cuts A Lot, select File → Open Project.
Craft Edge Easy Cut Studio (version 5 or later) can also open SCUT5 files. To open a SCUT5 file with Easy Cut Studio 5, select File → Import.
Sure Cuts A Lot can convert SCUT5 files to various file types, including the following formats:
